article_title: Outsourcing proposal upsets Oak Ridge parents, teaching assistants

article_metadata.description: Oak Ridge schools’ teaching assistants and paraprofessionals are reportedly upset by a proposed outsourcing of their jobs to a private company.
article_metadata.author: Donna Smith/The Oak Ridger
